
``giottoToSeurat``
======================

Convert Giotto to Seurat

Description
-----------

Converts Giotto object into a Seurat object

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   giottoToSeurat(obj_use = NULL, ...)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``obj_use``
     - Giotto object
   * - ``...``
     - additional params to pass to `\ ``get_spatial_locations`` <#getspatiallocations>`_


Value
-----

Seurat object
